entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of freezing rain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
